solution.text:
Volume of the large cube \(= _{{2*j}}_^3 cm^3\)
Volume of the small cube \(= _{j}_^3 cm^3\).
Therefore, number of cubes that can be cut \(= \frac {_{{2*j}}_^3}{_{j}_^3} = 8\) cubes

content.text: A cube has an edge measuring _{{2*j}}_ cm. Find the number of cubes of edge _{j}_ cm that can be cut off from it.
